name: Spell Binder (Android51)
description:
You are a wizard whose spellbook was ripped apart. Now you guide the wizard in his quest to repair his spellbook!

Warning: Audio might be loud. 

Controls: WASD/Arrows for movement. Aim your spells with your mouse and release magic with the left click. 

Made for the Global Game Jam 2020.

Theme:Repair
